summary.para: Represents a tensor patch with 16 control points, 4 corner colors, and boundary flags. An ID2D1GradientMesh is made up of 1 or more gradient mesh patches. Use the or the to create one.

remarks.para: The following image shows the numbering of control points on a tensor grid.

img.alt: Number of control points on a tensor grid
